name: Toy Physics Room
description:
My submission for the first Gdevelop Jam

Use your skills (and patience) to get the balls inside the box!

Each object have different physics properties like bounciness and friction, experiment with your tools efficiently and create solutions and build ways to pass the levels ,there are many strategies to do it!

There are 29 levels for you to complete, will you finish them all?

*All your progress will be save automatically

*Touch support available for mobile devices

Sounds made with Jfxr https://jfxr.frozenfractal.com/
